message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, and I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. My budget is quite limited, and I would like to propose a lower price. I am willing to pay $1650000 for the product.
I understand that you have a limited budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1700000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe we can reach an agreement within my budget. I am willing to pay $1675000 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go down to $1725000 for the product, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, and I respect your efforts to accommodate my budget. I am willing to pay $1700000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $1725000, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a comprehensive support package and a 10% discount on the price. That brings the total to $1712500 for the product.
Thank you for the additional benefits. They do add value to the product. Considering these extra benefits, I am willing to pay $1700000 for the product.

I think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to throw in an additional 5% discount on the price, which brings it down to $1675000 for the product, and I'll also include a 2-year warranty. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. Considering the additional benefits, I am willing to pay $1675000 for the product.
